name: John The Zombie Hunter
description:
Title: John The Zombie Hunter
Platform: PC Game Genre: Action, Shooter
Rating: T Target Market: Ages 14+, casual gamers Game Overview: This top-down shooter game involves traversing a randomly generated maze while collecting treasure chests. You must be careful, the zombies might kill you! The first level is simple and there are plenty of weapons. Level 2 is a different story... Make sure you get those chests quickly or you may end up one of them!
Instructions: WASD keyboard movement, Fire button (Mouse left click) to fire a bullet. Rotate your player by moving your mouse!Game Design Team: Qadeem Qureshi – Game Designer
